title_a = #{titleA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

( #{item.guideId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.titleA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.titleB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.titleC,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT title_a FROM guide_option WHERE guide_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY title_a
SELECT title_b FROM guide_option WHERE guide_id = #{projectId} and title_a = #{titleA} GROUP BY title_b
SELECT id,title_c FROM guide_option WHERE guide_id = #{projectId} and title_a = #{titleA} and title_b = #{titleB} GROUP BY id
